mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(id, pw, name, email, birth, gender) VALUES(#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{gender})
mapper.select: select id from member where id=#{id}
select * from member where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
mapper.update: update member set pw=#{pw}, name=#{name}, email=#{email} where id=#{id}
